author: struberg
msg: Fixing a bug which got introduced in r1091279 and caused entities

author: amassari
msg: Store the transcoded buffer as a janitor object, so that memory leaks cannot occur (XERCESC-1974)

author: dejanb
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3374 - don't count every write in transaction size as only the number of pages we keep in memory is relevant (multiple writes to the same page will overwrite themselves)
